summary: "Fringe" is an American sci-fi TV series created by J.J. Abrams and others. It aired on Fox from 2008 to 2013, with 100 episodes over five seasons. The show follows an FBI agent, a brilliant scientist, and his son who investigate strange events linked to a parallel universe. Based in Boston, they use fringe science to solve mysteries. Initially receiving mixed reviews, "Fringe" gained popularity for its unique blend of fantasy, drama, and sci-fi, exploring parallel universes and alternate timelines. Despite low ratings, it developed a dedicated fan base and was nominated for many awards.
title: Fringe (TV series)
